questions.question: Which of the following is the correct naming convention for a bolt with 5/8-inch diameter, 11 threads per inch pitch, and 1-3/4 inch length?
Both the Inch and Metric standards use a symmetrical ___________ thread profile.
When referring to bolt strength, two important material properties are ______ strength and ____ strength.
